article: One night, Mary heard some big  _  noise. "Doh, Doh, ..." It  went on  for a few minutes. Mary went out of her bedroom to search everywhere. Her parents were sleeping and there were no  other  people in the house. Mary  _  to her bedroom. Mary heard the noise again. She thought, "Is it a cat? Mike has a cat. But cats miaow. They don't make such noise." "Maybe it's a bird  _  around and looking for a place to rest. No! That doesn't make any noise." Maybe it's the whisper of my parents. They  must  be  _  in their room. But that noise wasn't a whisper at all." Mary went to bed again but she heard the noise again. She was  _  and fell  _  her bed. Her legs were  _  and she could not climb up any more.
